home.title: More Than One Story
home.description: More than one story is a game made to build bridges between people of all backgrounds. Individuals, schools, organizations and sponsors are working together to produce and spread More Than One Story to people around the world. If you would like to order the More Than One Story card game or be part of our network, please contact one of our partners or the Department of Culture and Leisure of Simrishamn, Sweden.  www.simrishamn.se/mtos

play.begin: We are all more than one story...

how-to-play.instructions: Begin with a short presentation of each player.  The oldest participant draws a card and reads it out loud. Holding the card, this player then tells a story.  The others listen actively and may encourage the story teller by asking questions. When the story teller decides to put the card down, then it is the next personâ€™s turn and the game continues clockwise.  If the group wishes, then time limits may be set for each story or the game itself.  Play as many rounds as you like. Free conversation is allowed between stories! Everybody wins!
